post.author: 임기순
post.content:
I am writing to inquire as to whether you may be interested in / suited for the following role advertised with one of our clients. Details are following and if you are suited & interested please respond with a most recent resume ASAP. Please forward this information around to your network as well if there may be people suited for it.
Our client located in Toronto is looking for a Java Team Lead for a permanent opportunity.
They are looking for someone to be accountable and responsible for the development of applications under the corporate umbrella. The role will include systems analysis, design, coding and unit / integration testing of identified systems. They are seeking advanced skill in J2EE and A minimum of five years experience in a JAVA development arena including at least one year in a similar lead role.
Type: Permanent Full time Rate: 85K base salary + Start: Immediate
As always, I can also be found on LinkedIn, if we aren't already connected please add me as I keep relevant work opportunities posted and I openly network with it. Click here: http://ca.linkedin.com/in/lucasrobbins
Cheers,
Lucas Robbins Senior Recruitment Consultant Recruiting experts in Information Technology
HAYS Recruiting experts worldwide
701-201City Centre Drive Mississauga ON L5B 2T4
D: 905 366 4527 T: 905 848 HAYS (4297) x222
M: 905 805 6872 F: 905 566 8877 E: lrobbins@hays.ca
hays.ca

post.title: HAYS IT - J2EE Team Lead Job Opportunity
